desc: Looking for an eco-friendly gift idea? Help endangered species in Canada by symbolically adopting a polar bear, snowy owl, lynx and many more. Gift packets include frame-ready certificates and booklets with stunning nature photography. NCC is the top nature charity in Canada.

layout.text:
Looking for a green gift idea?
Help endangered species in Canada by symbolically adopting a polar bear, snowy owl, lynx and many more.
